definition: the act of dwelling in a place
details:
noun
- the act of dwelling in a place
= synonyms: residency
- a large and imposing house
= synonyms: hall, manse, mansion, mansion house
- the official house or establishment of an important person, as a sovereign or president
= example: the official house or establishment of an important person, as a sovereign or president
- any address at which you dwell more than temporarily
= example: any address at which you dwell more than temporarily
= synonyms: abode
